Other Crs amt.formula: =[Total Bill Amt (Rounded Off)] - ([Bill Basic Amt] + [Dami Amt] + [Other Amt])

Cost as per Bill.formula: =[Total Bill Amt (Rounded Off)] / [Kanda Wt with Bardana(Qtl)]

Shortage.formula: =IF(([Bill Wt (Qtl)] - [Kanda Wt without Bardana(Qtl)]) > -0.0001, [Bill Wt (Qtl)] - [Kanda Wt without Bardana(Qtl)], 0)

Rate Diff (per Qtl).formula: =ROUND(IF(([Basic Rate as per Bill] - [Sauda]) > 0.5, [Basic Rate as per Bill] - [Sauda], 0), 2)

Fungus Cut.formula: =ROUND(IF([Fungus]<=1.5, 0, IF(AND([Fungus]>1.5,[Fungus]<=2), 5*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Fungus]>2,[Fungus]<=2.5), 10*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Fungus]>2.5,[Fungus]<=3), 15*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), 0)))), 0)

Broken Cut.formula: =IF([Broken]<=12, 0, IF(AND([Broken]>12,[Broken]<=15), 10*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Broken]>15,[Broken]<=16), 15*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Broken]>16,[Broken]<=17), 20*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Broken]>17,[Broken]<=18), 30*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Broken]>18,[Broken]<=19), 40*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), 0))))))

Moisture Cut.formula: =IF([Moist(%)]<=12, 0, IF(AND([Moist(%)]>12,[Moist(%)]<=15), 10*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Moist(%)]>15,[Moist(%)]<=16), 15*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Moist(%)]>16,[Moist(%)]<=17), 20*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Moist(%)]>17,[Moist(%)]<=18), 30*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), IF(AND([Moist(%)]>18,[Moist(%)]<=19), 40*MIN([Basic Rate as per Bill],[Sauda]), 0))))))

Raw Material Value.formula: =[Total Bill Amt (Rounded Off)] - [Fungus Cut] - [Broken Cut] - [Moisture Cut]
